EmailTemplate.description: This Email template will sent to the respective Account Owners Manager's whenever they have uncompliant Account
EmailTemplate.name: R/Q Non Compliant Accounts
EmailTemplate.subject: Review and Action: Accounts needing additional contacts to be identified to receive product notifications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi [[RECEIVINGUSERNAME ]],
You are receiving this message because there are currently accounts within your team’s territory(ies) that do not meet the minimum number of contacts identified to receive product notifications. It is important that contacts are identified within customer accounts so that important product notifications can be communicated effectively. Action Requested: * Please review the “Product Notifications Non Compliant Acct Report” for the list of accounts that currently do not meet the requirements * Communicate with your team to ensure that contacts are identified for product notifications within the listed accounts.
Thank you for your leadership!
